channel.title: Random on DevSetGo
channel.description: Recent content in Random on DevSetGo

item.title: And We Are Back...
item.description: So I broke my last site (or two). I had been using Wordpress and decided I wanted something light weight. So I started playing with Ghost and eventually had it running on my Docker instance. Initially I had it setup to learn and test, while also using it as my blog. Then I ran into a lot of issues… way more than you should run into when learning/building a blog.
